attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is for every hard working tax payer in the uk, who feels cheated by the MP'S. The situation needs to be investigated by the police for the last 10 years and we should be given a tax break.

These rules need to be abolished.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
